content.question: Imagine that you are making an oral presentation to your Japanese class. First, you will read the topic for your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as full as possible. Prepare your own view or perspective on Japanese transportation. Discuss at least FIVE aspects or examples of Japanese transportation. Begin with an appropriate introduction, give details, explain your overview or perspective, and end with a concluding remark.
